changeSet.author: kebrings

createTable.remarks: Entity comments, with matrix path encoding for path encoding (https://www.static-contents.youth4work.com/university/Documents/Colleges/CollegeSummaryAttach/3b7673f2-83f6-4e1c-aa8c-03bf6f31c83f.pdf)

column.name: path_depth
column.remarks: denormalized information contained in path matrix to make depth limited queries straight forward.

changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE vnext_comment ADD COLUMN path_left FLOAT GENERATED ALWAYS AS (path_a11 / path_a21) STORED
ALTER TABLE vnext_comment ADD COLUMN path_right FLOAT GENERATED ALWAYS AS (((path_a11 - path_a12) / (path_a21 - path_a22)) + 0.0000001) STORED

createTable.remarks: local copy of MSSQL User Moments

column.name: visibility
column.remarks: public, private, group, friends, friend_group etc.

column.name: visibility
column.remarks: public, private, group, friends, friend_groupm etc.
